ThingDef.label: QBA-69 shotgun
ThingDef.description: This 2th-generation intelligent shotgun system is specifically engineered for urban warfare and starship boarding operations. Featuring a fully-automatic firing mechanism combined with high-capacity drum magazines, it achieves exceptional cyclic rate through rotating feed systems. The modular CQB configuration employs specialized "parent-projectile" ammunition with limited submunitions payload per round, resulting in reduced single-shot penetration capability. Its groundbreaking neuro-linked targeting computer implements real-time threat assessment algorithms to automatically designate optimal secondary targets within 0.3 seconds of neutralizing primary threats, providing visual tracking via tactical HUD. Equipped with smart ballistic correction modules, the weapon's scatter-shot accuracy demonstrates exponential correlation with operator's synaptic conductivity levels. Mandatory deployment protocol requires colonists with Intellectual Skill rating 10+ for optimal performance. The rotating feed mechanism ensures sustained suppressive fire while maintaining target acquisition continuity.
